Description: The organisation will use the funding to redesign and redevelopment a former classroom into a community meeting room and activity space for use by all sections of the community. This will provide an accessible facility for use by community groups and events in an area without a community centre or adequate community meeting space.
Funding Org:Name: The Big Lottery Fund

Title: Community Information Leaflet
Description: A project by this community group based in Balsall Heath to produce a fortnightly newsletter in both English and Arabic to help increase awareness of the local community services available.
Funding Org:Name: The Big Lottery Fund

Title: Abbotsvale and Roosegate Community Centre
Description: This community association will use an award to improve their facilities and increase the number of activities available. This will directly benefit members of the local community.
Funding Org:Name: The Big Lottery Fund

Title: Westbury Day
Description: This is a project by a community organisation in Westbury, Wiltshire. The group will use the funding for a community open day. This will provide an opportunity for members of the community to find out about local groups and become more involved in community life. This will also encourage integration between the existing and newer members of the community.
Funding Org:Name: The Big Lottery Fund

Title: Increasing community usage of our building
Description: The organisation will use the funding to update their community facilities for the benefit of community groups in the local area. This will ensure that the facilities are fit for purpose for use by local community groups and increase access to a venue suitable for community activities.
Funding Org:Name: The Big Lottery Fund

Title: Pill Community Centre Garden Project
Description: This is a project by a charity in North Somerset. The group will use the funding to transform an usused area of their community centre to create a community garden. This will provide an area of space which heavily involve the participation of the local community and strengthen community relationships and cohesion.
Funding Org:Name: The Big Lottery Fund
